Havotron looked back after hearing clangs hit the ground.  "YOU 
WORTHLESS HUNKS OF JUNK" he once again screamed, then 
from the comment of Autofire let a blast from his cannon fly.  "I AM 
THE LEADER, OF ALL DECEPTICONS FOOL.  I SHALL LEAD 
US ALL INTO THE FIRES THAT WILL CONSUME THIS PLANET, 
ONLY TO LEAD YOU ALL BACK OUT ON TOP." he screamed.

Firestrike, thinking only of his teams safety, dived to intercept the 
shot.  "I sacrifice myself for others, unlike the coward Megatron" he 
said quitly, allowing the blas to consume his body, sending the 
limp giant bot flying towards Autofire.

Scrapper landed on the ground safely as well.  "Uh-Sir, lordship, 
Hook is too injured to combine."

"Shut up and combine anyways."

Scrapper looked to the injured Hook.  Then to Megatrons 
Decepticons, and once more to Soundwave.  Thinking for his 
teams safety from Megatron, he simply said, "No..."

The stare Havotron gave him, caused Scrapper to cowl in fear on 
the ground, hoping someone else would help him.

Needlenose looked to Spinister, "What do we do?" he said.

Dreadwind and Darkwing stood silently behind Havotron.
